data.rationale:
It will be located at.
    http://cpan.valueclick.com/authors/id/S/SH/SHARRISON/RPM-Tools-0.1.tar.gzls-0.1.tar.gz

    I think RPM::Update is a good choice since it is simple and relates
    to the purpose of usage.

    Uniqueness of approach: RPM::Update provides a lot of well-used
    options to compare, download, and upgrade RPMs on a system compared
    to a repository.
